DOC.brief_summary: A randomized , open-label , single-dosing , 2x2 crossover study compare safety pharmacokinetics HUG116 tablet ( Tenofovir Disoproxil ) Viread® tablet ( Tenofovir Disoproxil Fumarate ) healthy male volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trial Assess Safety Pharmacokinetics HUG116 Tablet Viread® Tablet Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Age 19 45 , healthy male subject ( screen ) Body weight 55kg , range calculate Ideal Body Weight ± 20 % Subject without hereditary problem , chronic disease morbid symptom Volunteer totally understand progress clinical trial , make decision free , signed consent form follow progress . Volunteer past present history disease follow . ( liver , kidney , digestive system , pulmonary , hematooncology , endocrine , urinary , neurology , mental disorder , skeletomuscular , immunology , otolaryngology , cardiovascular ) Volunteer GI tract disease ( Crohn 's disease , ulcer , acute chronic pancreatitis ) surgery ( appendectomy , hernioplasty exclude ) Volunteer hypersensitivity reaction medicine include Tenofovir Volunteer genetic disorder glucosegalactose malabsorption , Lapp lactose deficiency , galactose intolerance Sitting systolic blood pressure > 140mmHg < 100mmHg , sit diastolic blood pressure ≥ 90mmHg < 60mmHg , pulse ≥ 100 beat per minute Exceed 2 time normal range AST , ALT , Total Bilirubin screen test Have result Creatinine clearance less 50mL/min ( CockcroftGault equation applicable ) Have result serum test ( RPR Ab ( VDRL ) , HBsAg , HCV Ab , Anti HIV ( AIDS ) ) positive History drug abuse , positive urine drug screen Having ETC drug herbal medicine within 2 week first administration OTC drug vitamin preparation within week first administration Participation clinical trial involve investigational drug within 3 month Volunteer whole blood donation 2 month , component blood donation transfusion 1 month Regular alcohol consumption ( 21 units/week , 1unit=10g pure alcohol ) volunteer abstain drink study Volunteers smoke 10 cigarette per day last 3 month take surfeit caffeine ( caffeine > 400mg per day ) Subjects plan dental treatment ( tooth extraction , endodontic treatment etc . ) surgery ( aesthetic operation , laser insitu keratomileusis , laser assist subepithelial keratomileusis etc . ) sign informed consent form poststudy visit Any condition , view investigator , would interfere study participation
